comment.text: This translation key represents the title displayed in a modal dialog when a user initiates password recovery. It is used to provide a clear and descriptive label for the forgotten password functionality within the login form.

usage.context:
autoMaxHeight
 visible={isVisible}
 onClose={onDialogClose}
 id="forgot-password-modal"
 >
 <ModalDialog.Header>{t("PasswordRecoveryTitle")}</ModalDialog.Header>
 <ModalDialog.Body>
 <ModalDialogContainer>
 <Text
 key="text-body"
 className="text-body"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Parolun bərpa edilməsi' is a literal translation that is not the most natural way to express 'Password recovery' in Azerbaijani. While technically correct, it sounds somewhat clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Şifrənin bərpası' or 'Parolun unutulması və ya bərpası' for a more natural phrasing.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'ກູ້ຄືນລະຫັດຜ່ານ' is understandable, a more precise and common translation for 'Password recovery' would be 'ການດຶງລະຫັດຜ່ານຄືນ' or 'ຟື້ນຟູລະຫັດຜ່ານ'. 'ກູ້ຄືນ' implies rescuing or retrieving something that was lost, which is technically correct, but 'ຟື້ນຟູ' or 'ການດຶງຄືນ' feel more natural in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການດຶງລະຫັດຜ່ານຄືນ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala translation "මුරපදය ප්‍රතිසාධනය" (murapadaya pratisadhanaaya) while technically understandable, is a more formal and literal translation of 'password recovery'. A more natural and common phrasing would be more appropriate for a user interface.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more common phrase like "கடவுச்சொல் மீட்டமைவு" (kadavaschol miettamaiyu) or a similar, more colloquial rendering based on user research and style guidelines.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian (Cyrillic) translation 'Опоравак лозинке' is a misspelling and an incorrect translation of 'Password recovery'. The correct term for 'Password recovery' in Serbian (Cyrillic) is 'Opravljanje lozinke'.

The translation 'Oporavak lozinke' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Password recovery'. While 'oporavak' means 'recovery', 'lozinke' is in the genitive case, which isn't necessary here.  A better translation would use the nominative case.
